context: Lyft remains the #2 US ride-hailing platform focused on North America. The company partners with autonomous vehicle companies while Uber and Tesla develop robotaxi solutions.

competitors.name: Uber
competitors.notes: Dominant global competitor with rides, delivery, and AV partnerships

competitors.name: Waymo
competitors.notes: Google's autonomous ride-hailing service expanding coverage

competitors.name: Via
competitors.notes: Transit technology and dynamic shared rides

competitors.name: Revel
competitors.notes: Electric vehicle ride-hailing in urban markets

competitors.name: Public Transit
competitors.notes: Improved mass transit competing for urban trips

competitors.name: Micromobility
competitors.notes: E-bikes and scooters from Lime, Bird for short distances
